title: Fury Wars - Online Shooter
description: Fury Wars - Online Shooter is a wild third-person online shooter where chaos, absurd humor, and explosive action collide. Unleash a ridiculous arsenal—from flaming tridents to explosive fish—while battling as hilariously twisted hero parodies. Dive into Escort Mode, unleash ultimate abilities, and turn every match into a frantic, cartoon-style showdown packed with trashy, unpredictable fun.
